Homepage » About Us

Safety, Stability & Service

Based in the heart of Manchester, we have provided the backbone for the city's skyline for over 23 years. From the rapid expansion of residential developments in the early 2000s to today’s complex high-rise renovations, we have navigated the evolution of British construction with an unwavering commitment to site safety.

The Gold Standard of Safety

Every tube, board, and fitting we deploy is a testament to our rigorous standards. We don't just "erect scaffolding"; we engineer secure environments. By blending TG20:21 compliant design with modern safety technology, we deliver access solutions that exceed industry regulations and protect every worker on-site.

Engineered Integrity

Beyond the simple provision of metal and wood, we provide the platform for progress. Our division ensures that every project—from domestic chimney repairs to massive commercial infrastructure—is built upon a foundation of absolute stability. We provide more than just access; we provide the confidence your tradespeople need to perform at their best.

Why Choose Our Team?

  • Compliance Assured: Fully audited equipment and TG20:21 compliant scaffolding designs.
  • Qualified Experts: Our team consists of CISRS-qualified erectors and CITB-trained supervisors.
  • Rapid Response: We understand site timelines; we offer reliable delivery and fast dismantling services.
